definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2.5</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_nbt_num_set"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">time</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
